messages.subject: I guess this would be my introduction for you all.
messages.msgSnippet: 1) I hate my real name. My s/n is Akaiken hogo which roughly means red sword that defends in japanese 2) when I first heard of the shinsengumi, it was from
messages.messageBody:
1) I hate my real name. My s/n is Akaiken hogo which roughly
means "red sword that defends" in japanese

2) when I first heard of the shinsengumi, it was from my friends
talking about ruroni Kenshin, then I read an article about
peacemaker and started watching the DVDs

3) I dunno if I have a fave shinsengumi member, I don't really know
that much about them all to choose.

4) as I said Ive seen dvds 1-3 of peacemaker, and I saw the samurai
X movie,which has saito, but it takes place after the revolution.

5) I don't have a favorite quite yet, so I wouldn't know.
6) Not really.

These are replys to the questions in the email titled : [SHQ] Admin:
Important Shinsengumi Business
